name: DP203 - Lab 22 - Create Lake DB and View

content.query:
CREATE DATABASE lakedb;
GO

USE lakedb;
GO

CREATE CREDENTIAL [https://datalake3a8qtif.dfs.core.windows.net/files/products/products.csv]
WITH IDENTITY='Managed Identity';
GO

CREATE VIEW products_csv
AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalake3a8qtif.dfs.core.windows.net/files/products/products.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];
GO
